titleStmt.title: SII 8.31: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 31. (A.R. No. 445 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu nālāvatu ceyyūrāṉa jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūr Ūrom Ivvūr deva
rkaḷukkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟukku Uṭalāka Ivvūr Uppuppaṭukkum Aḷam toṇṇūṟṟilum Uppupaṭutta Aḷaṅkaḷilp paradeśikaḷukkum maṟ
ṟum kācukkuk koṇṭārkkum Aḷantu muṟppaṭṭa Uppil Uppuppiṭi vaittaparicāvatu veḷūraḷattil Uppuppiṭiyā luḷḷutu kurukīśva
ramuṭaiyamahādevaṟkum vaṭamuṭṭaikālaḷam veḷūraḷattukkut teṟku muṭṭaikālukku vaṭakku naṭuvuḷḷa Aḷaṅkaḷi luppuppiṭi
yā luḷḷatu puṟṟiṭaṅkoṇṭaruḷiṉa mahādevaṟku Irukūṟum Idevar paḷḷiyaṟainācciyāṟku Oru kūṟum koḷvatākavum teṉmuṭṭai
kālaḷattil vaṭakkaṭaiya patti luppuppiṭiyā luḷḷatu Arumoḻiśvaramuṭaiya mahādevaṟkum Iṭapāṭiyiṟai Oṭaiycciṟu
vatikku vaṭakki laḷamuṭpaṭat teṟkut tāṅkuvāṉaḷa muṭpaṭṭa pattaḷattil Uppup piṭiyāl Uḷḷatu kulottuṅkacoḷīśva
ramuṭaiyāṟkum Ippiṭiyāṟ teṟkiṟ kaṅkaikoṇṭāṉkāli laḷa muṉṟum teṟkiṟ periyaaḷam Oṉṟumāka nālaḷattiṟ piṭiyāluḷ
ḷatukku
paṇṭārattil maturāntakaviṇṇakarāḻvārkkum Ippaṭiyi litaṉ
koṇṭaḷattāluḷḷa Uppu coḷīśvara muṭaiya mahātevarkkum kaṅkaikoṇṭa coḻap
peraḷattilum] viṭṭa piṭiyā luḷḷatu sūryyatevarkkum Uṭaiyāṟkum Ārukadadevaṟkum Okkak koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum . Ivvaḷaṅkaḷiṟ paradeśikaḷukkump
kātiṭṭāṟkum Aḷantu nāṅkaḷeUppaḷappittukkoṇṭu Aḷattā lorukācu kkaṭavomākavum Eṅkaḷāl munṟattoṉṟu nāṅkaḷ
viṭṭomākil śrīmāheśvarañceyvikkakaṭava devakaṉmikaḷum tāṅkaḷe Uppup piṭittu I Ikkācu celuttakkaṭavārkaḷākavum sam mati
Digital edition of SII 8.31 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
